duties_responsibilities.duty: Carry out and supervise data analyses led by graduate students and postdoctoral fellows.
Write manuscripts for publication in scientific journals.
Assist with and lead the writing of grant applications for research funding.
Communicate with research funders and project administrative staff.

education_certification.credential: Doctoral degree with quantitative training or research experience.
Training and experience in quasi-experimental techniques is a plus.
A background in health-related research is a plus but not required.
